channel.title: Advent Of Code on Yet Another Iteration
channel.description: Recent content in Advent Of Code on Yet Another Iteration

item.title: Advent of Code 2020 | Days 8 to 10
item.description: Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like. These are my six solutions to the ‘Advent of Code 2020’ puzzles, from day 8 to day 10, using R.

item.title: Advent of Code 2020 | Day 07 | Playing with Graphs
item.description: In this post, we explore the day 7 puzzles of the Advent Of Code 2020 using network analysis through tidygraph package, allowing us generate a simple, direct and small code to solve them.

item.title: Advent of Code 2020 | Days 4 to 6
item.description: Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like. These are my six solutions to the ‘Advent of Code 2020’ puzzles, from day 4 to day 6, using R.
